data_models module¶

Created on Tue Sep 8 07:32:13 2015

@author classes: phanquochuy

Module that contains underlying data models for the graphics items used as annotation landmarks. The only two that are used are RotateRect and Polyline.

class data_models.Geometry[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtCore.QObject

class data_models.RotateRect(x=0, y=0, width=0, height=0, angle=0)[source]¶

Bases: data_models.Rect

Extension of Rect, that allows it to be rotated with an angle theta

Parameters

  • x (float) -- x coordinate of top corner

  • y (float) -- y coordinate of top corner

  • width (float) -- width of rectangle

  • height (float) -- height of rectangle

  • angle (float) -- angle of rotation

property angle¶

Angle of rotation

Returns

angle

Return type

float

property bounding_points¶

Returns the bounding points of the rectangle. The control_points are rotated using the angle of rotation

Returns

coords_rot shape (4,2)

Return type

np.array

property bounding_polygon¶

return the bounding points of the rectangle as a polygon. rotation

Return type

PyQt5.Qt.QPolygonF

property control_points¶
